messages.content: You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How can I show bank details on invoices in Eagle Software?

To display bank details on invoices: 1. Navigate to 'Settings' > 'Templates' > 'Invoice Templates'. 2. Select the template you wish to edit. 3. Add your bank details in the designated section. 4. Save the changes. For detailed instructions, visit: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/2717096-how-to-show-bank-details-on-invoices
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How do I generate a letter template in Eagle Software?

To generate a letter template: 1. Go to 'Settings' > 'Letter Templates'. 2. Click 'New Letter Template'. 3. Enter a template name and draft your content. 4. Use template tags to insert dynamic data. 5. Save the template. Detailed guidance is available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/2717099-how-to-generate-a-letter-template
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How can I set up default letters in Eagle Software?

To set up default letters: 1. Navigate to 'Settings' > 'Letter Templates'. 2. Create or edit a template. 3. Assign it as a default for specific actions or communications. 4. Save your settings. More information can be found at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/4034958-setting-up-default-letters
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How do I upload new agent photos in Eagle Software?

To upload new agent photos: 1. Go to 'Settings' > 'Agents'. 2. Select the agent profile to edit. 3. Click on the photo upload section to upload a new image. 4. Save the changes. For more details, visit: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/2717101-upload-new-agent-photos
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How can I create a new SMS template in Eagle Software?

To create a new SMS template in Eagle Software: 1. Navigate to 'Settings' > 'SMS Templates'. 2. Click 'New SMS Template'. 3. Enter a template name and message content. 4. Use template tags for dynamic data. 5. Save the template. Detailed instructions are available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/5156548-how-to-create-a-new-sms-template
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
What are the different user permission types in Eagle Software?

Eagle Software offers various user permission types to control access to different modules and features. These include roles for managing users, trust accounting, websites, contacts, listings, enquiries, appraisals, projects, tasks, contracts, commissions, invoices, marketing, and more. For a comprehensive explanation of each permission type, refer to: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/2717137-user-permission-types-explained
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How do I add email or letter template fields in Eagle Software?

To add fields to email or letter templates: 1. Navigate to 'Settings' > 'Email Templates' or 'Letter Templates'. 2. Edit the desired template. 3. Use template tags (e.g., {{Contact.FirstName}}) to insert dynamic fields. 4. Save the template. More information is available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/2717110-how-to-add-email-letter-template-fields
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How do I update direct debit payment details in Eagle Software?

To update your direct debit payment details in Eagle Software: 1. Navigate to 'Settings' > 'Billing & Subscription'. 2. Click on 'Payment Details'. 3. Enter the new direct debit information and confirm the changes. 4. Save your updated details. More information is available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/2717103-update-direct-debit-payment-details
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How do I update direct debit payment details in Eagle Software?

To update your direct debit payment details in Eagle Software: 1. Navigate to 'Settings' > 'Billing & Subscription'. 2. Click on 'Payment Details'. 3. Enter the new direct debit information and confirm the changes. 4. Save your updated details. More information is available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/2717103-update-direct-debit-payment-details
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How do I create an email template in Eagle Software?

To create an email template in Eagle Software: 1. Navigate to 'Settings' > 'Email Templates'. 2. Click 'New Email Template'. 3. Enter a template name and compose your email content. 4. Use template tags for dynamic data insertion. 5. Save the template for future use. More details are available at: http://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/2717102-how-to-create-an-email-template
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
What is the difference between an agent and a user in Eagle Software?

In Eagle Software, an 'agent' represents a real estate professional whose contact details are visible on listings, while a 'user' is someone with access to the CRM system. Users can manage data and settings but may not necessarily be displayed as agents. For more details, visit: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/2717100-the-difference-between-an-agent-and-a-user
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How do I manage custom fields in Eagle Software?

To manage custom fields in Eagle Software: 1. Navigate to 'Settings' > 'Custom Fields'. 2. Click 'New Custom Field' to add a new one. 3. Define the field name, type, and applicable categories. 4. Save the changes and use the custom field for enhanced data management. More information is available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/2717098-custom-fields
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How do I add or edit users in Eagle Software?

To add or edit users in Eagle Software: 1. Navigate to 'Settings' > 'Users'. 2. Click 'Add New' to create a new user and fill in the required details. 3. To edit an existing user, locate the user in the list and click 'Edit'. 4. Modify user roles and permissions as needed. 5. Save the changes. More details are available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/2717097-how-to-add-edit-users
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How do I use the address filter for 'Last Contacted' in Eagle Software?

The 'Last Contacted' filter in the Addresses section of Eagle Software allows you to view addresses based on the most recent communication with associated contacts. To use this filter: 1. Navigate to 'Addresses'. 2. Click on the filter options. 3. Select 'Last Contacted' and set the desired date range. 4. Apply the filter to display the relevant results. More details are available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/6280512-address-filter-last-contacted
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How do I generate a Sales or Rental Comparative Market Analysis (CMA) in Eagle Software?

To generate a Sales or Rental Comparative Market Analysis (CMA) in Eagle Software: 1. Navigate to 'Reports'. 2. Select 'Comparative Market Analysis'. 3. Choose the property type and location. 4. Select the comparable properties. 5. Generate the CMA report. More details are available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/3007481-how-to-generate-a-sales-or-rental-comparative-market-analysis-cma
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How do I import addresses in Eagle Software?

To import addresses in Eagle Software: 1. Navigate to 'Settings' > 'Import Data'. 2. Choose 'Addresses' as the data type. 3. Upload your CSV file. 4. Map the columns correctly. 5. Confirm and start the import process. More details are available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/3137921-how-to-import-addresses
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How do I export addresses in Eagle Software?

To export addresses in Eagle Software: 1. Navigate to 'Addresses'. 2. Apply any necessary filters. 3. Click on 'Export' and choose the file format (CSV, Excel, etc.). 4. Download the exported file. More details are available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/3161102-how-to-export-addresses
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How do I view only my own addresses in Eagle Software?

To view only your own addresses in Eagle Software: 1. Navigate to 'Addresses'. 2. Click on the filter options. 3. Select 'Owner' and choose 'Me'. 4. Apply the filter to see only your own addresses. More details are available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/3461048-how-do-i-view-only-my-own-addresses
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
What are ownership types in Eagle Software?

Ownership types in Eagle Software define how addresses are categorized based on ownership status. You can set different ownership types to differentiate between owned, rented, or other address relationships. To configure ownership types, navigate to 'Settings' > 'Ownership Types'. More details are available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/5164448-ownership-types
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.

What is the Automations Overview in Eagle Software?

The Automations Overview in Eagle Software provides an introduction to automating workflows, helping you save time on repetitive tasks. You can create rules that trigger specific actions based on user-defined conditions. More details are available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/2717096-automations-overview
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How do I stop an automation in Eagle Software?

To stop an automation in Eagle Software: 1. Navigate to 'Settings' > 'Automations'. 2. Locate the automation you want to stop. 3. Click 'Disable' or delete the automation if you no longer need it. More details are available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/4817817-how-to-stop-an-automation
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How does the 'Assign Contact' automation action work if a contact is already assigned?

If a contact is already assigned to a user, the 'Assign Contact' automation action will not override the existing assignment unless explicitly configured to do so. You can define automation rules to reassign contacts based on specific conditions. More details are available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/2717095-how-does-the-assign-contact-automation-action-work-if-a-contact-is-already-assigned
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How do I create a recurring task in Eagle Software?

To create a recurring task in Eagle Software: 1. Navigate to 'Tasks'. 2. Click 'New Task' and enter the task details. 3. Select the 'Repeat' option and choose the recurrence pattern (daily, weekly, monthly, etc.). 4. Save the task. More details are available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/2717094-how-to-create-a-recurring-task
You are a support chatbot for Eagle Software, providing users with accurate answers and referencing relevant help articles.
How do I manually start an automation in Eagle Software?

To manually start an automation in Eagle Software: 1. Navigate to 'Automations'. 2. Select the automation you want to trigger. 3. Click 'Run Now' to execute the automation immediately. More details are available at: https://eaglesoftware.help/en/articles/2717093-how-to-manually-start-an-automation
